This is something humans sent to the Demon Lord"},{"lineNumber":200522,"originalJapaneseLine":"　媚びを売る為に送りつけてきた物で！」","translatedEnglishLine":"to curry favor!\""},{"lineNumber":200523,"originalJapaneseLine":"「罠があってはいけませんので、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because it must not have any traps,"},{"lineNumber":200524,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラが検分していたところで……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera was inspecting it...!\""},{"lineNumber":200525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":200526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、えと……その……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, well... um...\""},{"lineNumber":200527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see.\""},{"lineNumber":200528,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew...\""},{"lineNumber":200529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ならば……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then...\""},{"lineNumber":200530,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは後で玉座の間に運べ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Take that to the throne room later.\""},{"lineNumber":200531,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":200532,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……不満でもあるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Do you have any objections?\""},{"lineNumber":200533,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いえ、なんでもありません！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, it's nothing!"},{"lineNumber":200534,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐにでもお運び致します！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will carry it immediately!\""},{"lineNumber":200535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":200536,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":200537,"originalJapaneseLine":"鷹揚に、魔王ランスは部屋を出て行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"With ease, Demon Lord Rance left the room."},{"lineNumber":200538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はぁーーっ！　あ、焦ったぁ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Haaah! Ah, that was close...!\""},{"lineNumber":200539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、ああ、どうしよう！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, what do we think...!"},{"lineNumber":200542,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どどど、どうすれば……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-what should we clouded."},{"lineNumber":200546,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ランスさん……どんどん人格が……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Rance-san... his personality is changing more and of resignation seeped from her face,"},{"lineNumber":200549,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人である彼女に出来ることは少ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"but as a demon, there was little she could do."},{"lineNumber":200550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、リズナ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Rizuna!"},{"lineNumber":200551,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前もどうすればいいか考えろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You understand...!"},{"lineNumber":200553,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大変、大変……」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is serious, really serious...\""},{"lineNumber":200554,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達が修行を開始して瞬く間に時間が過ぎる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Time passed in the blink of an eye since you began your training."},{"lineNumber":200555,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城に、皆が集結する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone gathered at Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":200556,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":200557,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":200558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh...\""},{"lineNumber":200559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へえ……ふぅん、ほお……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh... hmm, hoh...\""},{"lineNumber":200560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みんな、随分とたくましくなったね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone has become quite sturdy,"},{"lineNumber":200561,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見違えるようになったよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"you've changed beyond recognition.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラとリズナはすぐに片膝をついて頭を下げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera and Rizuna immediately knelt on one knee and bowed their heads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最早、その光景を疑問視する者など、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By now, there was no one who doubted that sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それより如何されました、魔王様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "M-more importantly, what brings you here, Demon Lord?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このような所にまでいらっしゃるとは珍しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's unusual for you to come to a place like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それをお前に言う必要があるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do I need to tell you that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ達が隠したものは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What Satera and the others had hidden,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーツのかかりが甘くかすかに露出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was poorly covered with a sheet and was faintly exposed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうです！　人間が魔王様に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes! This is something humans sent to the Demon Lord

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 媚びを売る為に送りつけてきた物で！」
「罠があってはいけませんので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because it must not have any traps,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが検分していたところで……！」
それは後で玉座の間に運べ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Take that to the throne room later."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いえ、なんでもありません！
すぐにでもお運び致します！」
鷹揚に、魔王ランスは部屋を出て行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With ease, Demon Lord Rance left the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はぁーーっ！　あ、焦ったぁ……！」
こんなものを持って行くわけにはいかないぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't possibly take something like this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リズナが魔王ランスが去って行った方に顔を向け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rizuna turned her face toward the direction Demon Lord Rance had left,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランスさん……どんどん人格が……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Rance-san... his personality is changing more and more...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その顔には諦観の色が滲み出ていたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An air of resignation seeped from her face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人である彼女に出来ることは少ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but as a demon, there was little she could do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前もどうすればいいか考えろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should also think about what to do!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達が修行を開始して瞬く間に時間が過ぎる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Time passed in the blink of an eye since you began your training.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に、皆が集結する。
「みんな、随分とたくましくなったね。
見違えるようになったよ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラとリズナはすぐに片膝をついて頭を下げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera and Rizuna immediately knelt on one knee and bowed their heads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最早、その光景を疑問視する者など、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By now, there was no one who doubted that sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それより如何されました、魔王様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "M-more importantly, what brings you here, Demon Lord?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このような所にまでいらっしゃるとは珍しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's unusual for you to come to a place like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それをお前に言う必要があるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do I need to tell you that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ達が隠したものは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What Satera and the others had hidden,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーツのかかりが甘くかすかに露出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was poorly covered with a sheet and was faintly exposed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうです！　人間が魔王様に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes! This is something humans sent to the Demon Lord

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 媚びを売る為に送りつけてきた物で！」
「罠があってはいけませんので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because it must not have any traps,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが検分していたところで……！」
それは後で玉座の間に運べ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Take that to the throne room later."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いえ、なんでもありません！
すぐにでもお運び致します！」
鷹揚に、魔王ランスは部屋を出て行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With ease, Demon Lord Rance left the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はぁーーっ！　あ、焦ったぁ……！」
こんなものを持って行くわけにはいかないぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't possibly take something like this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リズナが魔王ランスが去って行った方に顔を向け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rizuna turned her face toward the direction Demon Lord Rance had left,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランスさん……どんどん人格が……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Rance-san... his personality is changing more and more...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その顔には諦観の色が滲み出ていたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An air of resignation seeped from her face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人である彼女に出来ることは少ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but as a demon, there was little she could do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前もどうすればいいか考えろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should also think about what to do!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達が修行を開始して瞬く間に時間が過ぎる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Time passed in the blink of an eye since you began your training.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に、皆が集結する。
「みんな、随分とたくましくなったね。
見違えるようになったよ」
